JOELib2

Package joelib2.feature

Provides classes for defining molecular properties (descriptors).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BitVectorValue Interface to have a fast method to getting binary (bit string) descriptor values.
DistanceMetricValue Interface to have a fast method to getting similarity metric values.
Feature Interface for defining descriptors, which can be calculated by using JOELib.
FeatureDescription  
FeatureInfo TODO description.
FeatureResult Interface definition for descriptor results.
NativeValue Interface to have a fast method to getting native descriptor values.
NumberFormatResult Interface definition for descriptor results which use number formats.
 

Class Summary
AbstractAtomsCounter Abstract descriptor class for counting the number of atoms.
AbstractBoolean Representation for a simple integer value descriptor.
AbstractDouble Representation for a simple double value descriptor.
AbstractDoubleAtomProperty Descriptor class for calculating an atom property which are double values.
AbstractDynamicAtomProperty Descriptor class for calculating an atom property (dynamic value type definition).
AbstractDynamicBondProperty Descriptor class for calculating an atom property (dynamic value type definition).
AbstractInt Representation for a simple integer value descriptor.
AbstractSMARTSCounter Representation for a simple SMARTS counter descriptor.
AbstractStringAtomProperty Descriptor class for calculating an atom property which are String values.
BasicFeatureDescription Access class to the descriptor descripton files.
BasicFeatureInfo Informations for a descriptor.
Description Description for a descriptor.
FeatureFactory Factory class to get descriptor calculation classes.
FeatureHelper Some methods to faciliate the work with descriptors.
ResultFactory Factory class to get descriptor results and faciliate the parsing of descriptor entries.
 

Exception Summary
FeatureException Descriptor exception.
 

Package joelib2.feature Description

Provides classes for defining molecular properties (descriptors).
